greeting.title:
Siyun
 & 
Konstantin
greeting.message:
Love has come to fruition
Korea and Russia
A man and a woman born in faraway countries meet
We became one and bore the fruit of true love
It would be a great pleasure
if you come to share this moment with us!

locationInfo.title: How to get there
locationInfo.desc:
Please get off at Exit 2 of Bukhansan Ui Station and use the shuttle bus.
Shuttle buses run every 10 minutes from 4PM to 10PM.

information.message1: Sunwoongak is famous for its beautiful fall foliage. You are welcome to arrive early to enjoy the scenery with welcome drink.
information.message2: Please join us to celebrate our new life together.
information.message3: Western and Korean buffet style meal and variety drinks will be provided.
information.message4: DJ dance party will starts after dinner until 10pm. Guests are free to leave after the meal in case they have any commitments.
